> OOC:  the tunnel is clear for travel down to where the adjecent tunnel is,
> though it won't be for long.  Aso, I can't really post until i have an idea where
> Rodimus is.

Rodimus is currently inside Scorponok and they are tunneling underground, making thier way near to Hydras' Base. I do not know how good Megatron's sensors are if they would be able to perceive him through all the tonnage of rock between them rock? I will leave that up to you. 

However, what I do need to know from Airly is where exactly is Hydras' base? I assumed it was on the contenant of America since they were so quickly able to get to Portland, Oregon - Where the Ark is? but I could be wrong. Also what condition is the Black Fortress in? Seeing as it just withstood an attack by ALOT of sweeps before they redirected themselves to the Ark. 

It would help me in my next posts as well. 

Thanks

Preston
